entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain or periods of drizzle this morning and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
